health_discussed_people_names: Hon (Ms) Akinyi, Hon Saad Faraj, Hon Mohamed Hatimy, Hon Ahmed Ebrahim Omar, Hon Nasser Rashid
health_data_challenges: The discussions identified a challenge in determining whether the responsibility for addressing asbestos roofing in public primary schools lies with the county government or the national government.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: The participants recommended making amendments to the motion to address concerns about the financial implications of replacing asbestos roofing in schools and to coordinate with the national government for assistance.
health_sector_decisions: No decisions were made regarding the health sector.
